role.descr: how much you're bidding, buying price

example.name: autogen1
example.text: New England Electric System bowed out of the bidding for Public Service Co. of New Hampshire , saying that the risks were too high and the potential payoff too far in the future to justify a higher offer .
example.arg: for Public Service Co. of New Hampshire
